name: FNF Kapi for MAC
description:
I need to say this...

FNF Kade Engine for MAC.. for some reason, everytime you beat a song, it just crashes the game. There isnt really nothing to worry about! Just wanted to say...

AND BTW!!!! IF YOU GO IN STORY MODE! PLEASE CHOOSE WEEK 1 & 2 & 3

a.k.a Kapi, G&W, Kapi2

Kapi Week : Wocky, Beathoven and Hairball

G&W Week : Flatzone

Kapi2 Week : Nyaw
